main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 15/08/58 in West Point, Mississippi. The object was described as reddish blue and white, about the size of a silver dollar, and it moved at high speed in a zig-zag course with no sound or trail. The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes, and no conclusive identification or significance of the object was determined.
interesting points: The UFO was visually observed by control tower operators and tracked on ATCP radar at Columbus AFB.
Witnesses, including a telephone operator and an engineer, were considered reliable by the investigators.
The object appeared to be hovering over West Point, Mississippi.
The observers noted that the object was parallel to the ground and it moved in a zig-zag course.
An investigation by the HQ 4228 Strategic Wing (SAC) found no possible explanation for the sighting.
sighted object: reddish blue & white UFO the size of a silver dollar
